Special Badges for ongoing peer-to-peer recognition:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each employee has an opportunity to give a special adidas recognition badge through the Heroes Portal at any time. This badge can be given for special achievements, such as extra mile and going above and beyond their day-to-day responsibilities and assignments, or appreciating someone for being helpful & supportive and for any reason to say thank you.\\n\\nYou can give our badges independently or get them from the project leadership team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":326832,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eab2386e-97c6-4f30-91ec-75afa843f3db/Screenshot - 2022-10-20T193214.490.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eab2386e-97c6-4f30-91ec-75afa843f3db/Screenshot - 2022-10-20T193214.490.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot - 2022-10-20T193214.490.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot - 2022-10-20T193214.490.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eab2386e-97c6-4f30-91ec-75afa843f3db\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":716,\"height\":177},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":296789,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2d82b64d-3bd7-479f-8874-d121ebc7d233/Screenshot_17.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2d82b64d-3bd7-479f-8874-d121ebc7d233/Screenshot_17.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot_17.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot_17.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2d82b64d-3bd7-479f-8874-d121ebc7d233\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":791,\"height\":315},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
